title: The Chase
narrative:
Read aloud to players:

Gunshots crack through the night air! The contact crumples, the data chip clattering to the wet pavement. The two figures from the alley are running toward you, weapons drawn.

You have seconds to act.
gmNotes:
This is a chase scene. The pursuers are corporate security - well-trained but not elite. They want the data chip recovered intact.

If players flee: Run a chase skill challenge (3 successes before 3 failures).
If players fight: Standard combat, 2 security operatives.

npcs.name: Corporate Security (x2)
npcs.notes: Want the data chip. Will call for backup if fight goes badly.

npcs.name: Yuki Sato
npcs.notes: Shot in the opening. Use 'Contact Dies' trigger for last words.

skillChecks.name: Athletics
skillChecks.success: You vault over a market stall, gaining ground on your pursuers.
skillChecks.fail: You stumble on the slick pavement, losing precious seconds.

skillChecks.name: Stealth
skillChecks.success: You duck into a side alley and press against the wall. The pursuers run past.
skillChecks.fail: They spot your movement and adjust their pursuit.

skillChecks.name: Technology
skillChecks.success: You hack a nearby drone to create a distraction.
skillChecks.fail: The security systems reject your intrusion attempt.

triggers.label: Contact Dies
triggers.text: The contact's eyes go wide, then empty. Their last words are a whisper: 'Find... Aria...'

triggers.label: Chase Begins
triggers.text: Roll initiative! The chase is on.
